ns0:DescribedValueSet.ns0:Purpose: (Clinical Focus: This value set contains codes or concepts that identify smokeless tobacco as a substance.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use Quality Data Model (QDM) category related to Assessment, Performed for "Tobacco product" as an attribute of result. The intent of this data element is to identify smokeless tobacco as a substance.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes only relevant concepts associated with SNOMED CT codes identifying smokeless tobacco as a smoking substance or product.),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes concepts that pertain to tobacco products or substances other than Smokeless Tobacco. (e.g. cigarettes, cigar, pipe tobacco).)
